description.value:
You unlock a new level of fey power and can manipulate the perceptions of others using a font of First World magic. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fey Glamour]{Fey Glamour} focus spell as a primal spell that doesn't have the sorcerer trait. If you don't already have a focus pool, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

Special This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).
